name: drupal/rng
description: Provides ability to create and manage events and registrations.

suggest.drupal/token: Improves token UI on message template forms.
suggest.drupal/rng_conflict: Prevent registrations when a registrant is registered for a similar event.
suggest.drupal/rng_contact: Provides a simple contact entity type.
suggest.drupal/rng_date_scheduler: Control whether a user can register based on current time in relation to date fields attached to an event entity.
